category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_DEFERRED_NOTIFICATION_TIME
preference.preference_description: Specifies the notification time in minutes before the user is warned that the deferred session is about to expire. After you change this preference's value, you must log off and then log on for it to take effect. Valid Values: Any numerical value indicating the number of minutes until deferred session expires.
